tuv.seg: Introduction to the Irish System
Tús eolais ar chóras na hÉireann
This document provides an overview of housing in Ireland
Soláthraíonn an doiciméad seo forléargas ar thithíocht in Éirinn
Outline of health care services in Ireland, including public and private health care, and health insurance
Tá cur síos anseo ar sheirbhísí cúram sláinte in Éirinn, san áireamh tá cúram sláinte phoiblí agus phríobháideach
An overview of income tax and other taxes in Ireland
Léargas ginearálta ar cháin ioncaim agus ar chánacha eile in Éirinn
Moving your children to primary school
Do pháiste a aistriú chuig bunscoil in Éirinn
Introduces the system of education in Ireland at primary level and information describes the procedures involved in enrolling a child in primary school
Tá cur síos anseo ar an gcóras bunscolaíochta in Éirinn agus eolas ar na córais iarratais a bhaineann leo agus ar do pháiste a chur chuig do rogha scoil
Moving your children to secondary school
Do pháisté a aistriú chuig meánscoil Éireannach
Different schooling options available in the secondary school system in Ireland and outlines the state examination system
Tá cur síos anseo ar na roghanna sa chóras scoile ag an dara leibhéal in Éirinn agus ar an gcóras scruduithe Stáit
Moving to Ireland and your social security entitlements
Do chearta leasa shóisialta agus tú ag bogadh go hÉirinn
This document discusses your social welfare entitlements if you move to Ireland from abroad
Pléann an cháipéis seo do chearta leasa shóisialta má bhogann tú go hÉirinn ón gcoigrích
Rights of citizens and residents of Ireland to vote in elections
Tá cur síos anseo ar chearta shaoránaigh na hÉireann agus iad siúd go bhfuil conaí orthu in Éirinn a vótá a chaitheamh in aon toghchán
Political system at national level
An córas polaitiúil ag leibhéal náisiúnta
This description of the way in which the political system operates at mational level includes an outline of the Oireachtas
Tá cur síos sa cháipéis seo ar an gcóras polaitiúil ag leibhéal náisiúnta, chomh maith le cur síos ar an Oireachtas
It also contains an explanation of the political terms used
Tá míniú tugtha freisin ar na téarmaí polaitiúla a úsáidtear
Political system at local level
An córas polaitiúil ag leibhéal aitiúil
The role and responsibility of local authorities and overview of local government system at county/city level and at sub-county level
Tá cur síos anseo ar an córas rialtais ag leibheal áitiúil, ag leibheal contae/cathrach agus ag leibheal fochontae
Social welfare system in Ireland
An córas leasa shóisialaigh in Éirinn
What is the social welfare system in Ireland?
Céard é an córas leasa shóisialaigh in Éirinn?
How is it organised and who can apply for social welfare benefits? This document provides an overview of the system and includes links to more information
Cén chaoi a bhfuil sé eagraithe agus cé na daoine gur féidir leo iarratas a dhéanamh ar shochair leasa shóisialaigh?
This document is in: Social Welfare > Irish social welfare system
This document is in: Leas Sóisialach > Córas Leasa Shóisialaigh na hÉireann
